Name: Zoning, Long Island City Neighborhood Plan, Queens (C 250175 HAQ).
Title: Application number C 250175 HAQ (Long Island City Neighborhood Plan) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development (HPD), pursuant to Article 16 of the General Municipal Law of New York State for the designation of an Urban Development Action Area and an Urban Development Action Area Project, and Pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for the disposition of such property to a developer to be selected by HPD, for property located on a block bounded by Vernon Boulevard, 45th Avenue, 5th Street, and 44th Drive (Block 24, Lot 7), Borough of Queens, Community District 2, Council District 26.

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Land Use
This Land Use Application was Referred to Comm by Council to the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises
